H0.text: The long distance train, 'The Canadian', travels between Toronto and which other city. Vancouver

H1.text: The long distance train, 'The Canadian', travels between Toronto and which other city. Montreal

H2.text: The long distance train, 'The Canadian', travels between Toronto and which other city. Calgary

H3.text: The long distance train, 'The Canadian', travels between Toronto and which other city. CIVI

A4.text: The Canadian is a transcontinental passenger train operated by Via Rail on its Western Canada service between Union Station in Toronto, Ontario, and Pacific Central Station in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.

A5.text: In 1978, Via Rail Canada acquired the service, and, on January 15, 1990, designated the Canadian as its sole transcontinental service, between Toronto and Vancouver.
